    A

    addDeviceButtonListener(ActionListener) - Method in class View.HomeView
    action listener for the device button -> goes to device list page
    addHomeButtonListener(ActionListener) - Method in class View.HomeView
    action listener for the home button -> go back to the home page
    addInputButtonListener(ActionListener) - Method in class View.HomeView
    action listener for the input button -> send message to LLM
    addLoginListener(ActionListener) - Method in class View.LoginView
    Adds listener for the login button for the LoginController to act
    addMessageToChat(String, SPEAKER) - Method in class View.HomeView
    adds a specific message to the main chat window using the SPEAKER type to determine the display location
    addMessageToChatHistory(String, SPEAKER) - Method in class Controller.HomeController
    addMessageToChatHistory() will update the chat area with either input questions from the user or responses from the LLM method call directly to the view to update this area
    addUserProfileButton(ActionListener) - Method in class View.HomeView
    action listener for the user profile button -> user profile page
    AI - Enum constant in enum class ENUMS.SPEAKER
    represents the response from Pulsy (the LLM endpoint)
    ApiHandling - package ApiHandling
    This package contains core classes for executing the HTTP Request from the Application to the LLM REST API It additionally contains mock classes for testing
    AppController - Class in Controller
    Act as a Controller for the entire Application
    AppController() - Constructor for class Controller.AppController
    Controller constructor - directly calls go method upon initialization
    APPLEWATCH - Enum constant in enum class ENUMS.DeviceName
    represnts the Apple Watch device - overrides to String to Apple Watch for the GUI
    authenticate(String, String) - Method in class Model.LoginModel
    Authenticates the provided username and password using UserDB.json
    authenticate(String, String) - Method in class Model.MockLoginModel
    Mock class Method to test Login Controller is passing in correct values for the authenticate method
